column5: This apartment is:  * Just outside NW Austin city limits in Cedar Park * Convenient to all things Austin * Minutes from Lake Travis * Located a few minutes from the Austin Metro Rail * In an area where Uber and Lyft are available!  * Walking distance to local parks, restaurants and dining * Down the street from one of the area's largest malls * A popular place because of location  * Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers * FREE WIFI
column8: Comfy NW Austin Suburb Apt near Metro Rail to Aus
